AudioInfo
struct
AudioInfo

Contains information about audio devices available on the system.  This structure is returned by IWebCamera::GetAvailableAudioDevices.

Members
name

friendly name for the device

symlink

Symbolic link name for the device. This is passed to CreateWebCamera.

samplingRates

list of supported sampling rates

bitsPerSample

number of bits per sample

channels

number of audio channels

Module

import Cameras.WebCamera.IWebCamera;
